sentences.en: Chinese handwriting has infinite power to express differences of character and cultivation.

sentences.en: I saw several sugar canes, but wild, and for cultivation, imperfect.

sentences.en: These high yields have been achieved largely through better methods of cultivation.
sentences.cn: 这样高的产量主要是通过改良耕作方法取得的.

sentences.en: This land has been in cultivation since the last century.

sentences.cn: 这种耕作方法可提高产量.
